articles.author: Andrew Cunningham
articles.title: Ars Technica system guide: Falling prices are more exciting than new parts - Ars Technica
articles.description: Falling prices mean you can get more for your money than you could last year.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ AMD's Ryzen 7700X makes enough sense to feature in our higher-end gaming build.
32
It's been a while since our last system guide, and a few new productsmost notably AMD's Ryzen 9000 series… [+3832 chars]
